revision.text:

|brand = Panda Wireless |model = PAU0A |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = July 12, 2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Panda_Wireless_PAU0A |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = mini dongle
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = 2ADUTLGPAU0A |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = MediaTek;MT7610U; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam = <!-- AC-qam --> |802.11ac = 433 |nqam = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |802.11n = 150/150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/22/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07C9TYDR4 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "5C09 V1.3" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The [[MediaTek]] chip model is not legible in the FCC internal photos but it is very likely a MT7610U.
The FCC entry also covers the [[Panda Wireless IGU0A]] and the [[Panda Wireless PGU0A]] which supposedly just have different colors.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
